import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function ProductsSection(){const[selectedProduct,setSelectedProduct]=useState(null);const[photoIndex,setPhotoIndex]=useState(0);const[isOpen,setIsOpen]=useState(false);const openProductModal=productIndex=>{setSelectedProduct(productIndex);setIsOpen(true);};const closeProductModal=()=>{setSelectedProduct(null);setIsOpen(false);};const prevProduct=()=>{setPhotoIndex((photoIndex+Products[selectedProduct].image.length-1)%Products[selectedProduct].image.length);};const nextProduct=()=>{setPhotoIndex((photoIndex+1)%Products[selectedProduct].image.length);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{id:"products",className:"w-full",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mx-auto bg-green-900 bg-opacity-70 body-font",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-center mb-20",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-6xl font-bold text-center my-10 bg-green-600 text-white",children:"Alguns de nossos produtos"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-4 lg:w-4/5 sm:mx-auto sm:mb-2",children:Products.map((product,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"p-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg-white rounded-lg p-4 hover:shadow-lg hover:bg-gray-100 transition-all duration-300",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("figure",{className:"relative cursor-pointer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.image[0]// Use the first image as the card image
,alt:product.name,className:"h-48 w-full object-cover transition-transform duration-300 hover:scale-110 rounded-lg",onClick:()=>openProductModal(index)})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-teal-500 text-lg mt-4 text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-2xl font-semibold",children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-600 text-base mt-2",children:product.subtitle}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"mt-2 text-gray-600 text-2",children:product.description})]})]})})},index))})]}),isOpen&&selectedProduct!==null&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Lightbox,{mainSrc:Products[selectedProduct].image[photoIndex],nextSrc:Products[selectedProduct].image[(photoIndex+1)%Products[selectedProduct].image.length],prevSrc:Products[selectedProduct].image[(photoIndex+Products[selectedProduct].image.length-1)%Products[selectedProduct].image.length],onCloseRequest:closeProductModal,onMovePrevRequest:prevProduct,onMoveNextRequest:nextProduct,animationDuration:200,imageTitle:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-white",children:Products[selectedProduct].name}),imageCaption:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-white",children:Products[selectedProduct].name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-white text-lg",children:Products[selectedProduct].description})]})})]});}
